程序包 engine

类 Service

java.lang.Object
engine.Service
直接已知子类:
AdminBookingService, ChangeBookingService, CheckBookingService, GoBackService, GoSubsystemService, HomeBookingService, InterviewService, LoginService, OnSiteBookingService, ScanQRCodeService, SearchSiteService, SignUpService, ViewProfileService, ViewSiteListService
public abstract class Service extends Object
Base class for Actions. These represent things that the player can do. Reference FIT2099_Assignment1_v2

  • 方法详细资料

    • execute

      public abstract String execute(CurrentOperator currentOperator)
      Perform the Action.
      参数:
      currentOperator - The actor performing the action.
      返回:
      a description of what happened that can be displayed to the user.

    • menuDescription

      public abstract String menuDescription(CurrentOperator currentOperator)
      Returns a descriptive string
      参数:
      currentOperator - The actor performing the action.
      返回:
      the text we put on the menu

    • hotkey

      public String hotkey()
      Returns the key used in the menu to trigger this Action. There's no central management system for this, so you need to be careful not to use the same one twice. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connascence
      返回:
      The key we use for this Action in the menu, or null to have it assigned for you.

    • getNextAction

      public Service getNextAction()
      This provides a mechanism for Actions to take more than one turn. For example, an action can change its state and return itself, or return the next Action in a series. By default, this returns null, indicating that the Action will complete in one turn. Ideally, only use this on Player otherwise you may have unexpected game behaviour (e.g., 1 turn delay).
      返回:
      null
